description:
go.blog/cmd/blog: add JSON feed with JSONP support

This is to include summaries of the blog articles on the Go home page.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog

LGTM

but those Content-Types should have "; charset=utf-8".

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7567cee69bac&repo=blog ***

go.blog/cmd/blog: add JSON feed with JSONP support

This is to include summaries of the blog articles on the Go home page.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
